channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- quarkus-vertx-http
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- quarkus-vertx-http

item.title: CVE-2023-0044|2023-02-23T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- quarkus-vertx-http
item.description: If the Quarkus Form Authentication session cookie Path attribute is set to `/` then a cross-site attack may be initiated which might lead to the Information Disclosure. This attack can be prevented with the Quarkus CSRF Prevention feature.
